attributes.action: More job opportunity for school leavers and college leavers.
attributes.additional_details:
There HAS to be a bigger opportunity of apprenticeships and work for young men and women all across the country for school leavers and college leavers.

There are very few jobs on the market today and almost all jobs require experience. How is a person supposed to get experience if no one is willing to give a young person a chance? This is forcing them to work in a dead end, hard labour job with no development.

There has to be a government scheme set up to financially back up businesses and company's to allow them to make apprenticeships and job vacancy's, which are then in turn took to schools and given to young adults 16 to 25.
